website_summaries.verdict: Has a lot to offer for less- the best choice for budget-conscious aquarium owners.
pros: Offers features that both fish and aquarium hobbyists love for a value price – hiding places, attractive design, and safe materials
cons: Large fish may not fit in some of the holes and crevices, but this is a minor concern

customer_reviews.title: My fish love their castle
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it cute, but lots of hidey-hole places for my smaller fish. I love when they go inside and stare out the windows at me!
customer_reviews.author: Amy_G

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a castle roof broken, and several very ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a castle roof broken, and several very sharp edges on the seam that I couldn't smooth off without breaking away the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Loving2live

customer_reviews.title: Weong item sent
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to get the castle. It looked amazing. Instead I got some small thing that doesn't look anything like the picture. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but parts of it were sharp enough and caused minor cuts on my fish. Removed it once I saw the cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty in the aquarium, good size for the price. Arrived in time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam 84

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it was broken when I got it !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The castle itself looks very nice, but two of the spires were broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Jerod Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in several pieces due to poor packaging of the unit (not Amazon packaging) Had to return. I believe I would have been happy with the product if it had arrived intact.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Paint rubs off with routine cleaning contaminating the water
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The paint came off upon first routine cleaning about two weeks after being placed in the tank. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: John Snyders

customer_reviews.title: Love the castle
customer_reviews.text: Our fish love this castle! It was broken when we first received it, but Amazon customer service promptly put in another order to replace it. The holes are a tad small so I wouldn't recommend for larger fish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Govine Aquarium Decorations Castle, Aquarium Ornament Super Castle,9.6"
